youtube.title: Understanding Ectopia Cordis: When the Heart Develops Outside the Chest
youtube.description: Ectopia Cordis is an extremely rare congenital condition where the heart is partially or totally located outside the thoracic cavity. In this video, we see a clinical presentation of this anomaly. Learn more about cardiac development and rare medical cases in our latest biology series.
